domain.title: Domain Management
domain.subtitle: Manage your website domains and SSL certificates
domain.addFirstDomain: Add your first domain below to get started
domain.dnsInstructions: Point your domain to your website by updating DNS records at your domain registrar.
domain.dnsPropagation: DNS propagation can take up to 48 hours. Your domain will show as "Pending" until DNS records are properly configured.
domain.sslSecured: Your website is secured with HTTPS

backups.title: Backups & Staging
backups.subtitle: Protect your website with automated backups and staging environments
backups.createFirstBackup: Create your first backup to protect your website data.
backups.restoreWarning: This will overwrite your current website with the backup data. This action cannot be undone.

cache.title: Cache & Performance
cache.subtitle: Optimize your website performance with caching and PHP management

security.title: Security Settings
security.subtitle: Protect your website with advanced security features
security.protectionActive: Password protection is active. Visitors must enter the correct password to access your website.
security.makeSecurePassword: Make sure to save this password in a secure location. You'll need it to access your website.

pages.title: Pages Management
pages.subtitle: Create, edit, and manage your website pages
pages.createFirstPage: Create your first page to get started.
pages.selectPages: Please select pages to perform bulk actions
pages.pageWillBeDraft: The page will be created as a draft. You can edit it further in WordPress admin and publish when ready.

store.title: Store, Forms & Automations
store.subtitle: Manage your e-commerce, forms, and marketing automation
store.storeOpened: WooCommerce setup wizard is opening in a new tab
store.formsOpened: WordPress forms admin is opening in a new tab
store.webhookTested: The test request was sent to Zapier. Please check your Zap's history to confirm it was triggered.

advanced.title: Advanced Features
advanced.subtitle: Monitor your website's performance, logs, and system information
advanced.storageWarning: Storage usage is high ({percent}%). Consider cleaning up old files or upgrading your storage plan.
advanced.logTypes: Access logs show visitor requests, Error logs show server errors, and PHP logs show PHP warnings and errors. Use these for troubleshooting issues.

errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.invalidInput: Please check your input and try again.
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action.
errors.notFound: The requested resource was not found.
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
errors.validationFailed: Please check your input and try again.
